version_description: Our team is working permanently to improve your experience.
Our team is working permanently to improve your experience.

Dear Assassins,
This latest release includes the following improvements:
- FACEBOOK: You can use Facebook again to create an account.
- BUGS FIXED: Several smaller bug fixes will improve your experience.
Enjoy the game!

Dear Assassins,
This latest release includes the following improvements:
- FACEBOOK: You can use Facebook again to create an account.
- BUGS FIXED: Several smaller bug fixes will improve your experience.
Enjoy the game!
Our team is working permanently to improve your experience.
Our team is working permanently to improve your experience.
Discover now one of the most popular franchise of all time on your mobile device !
Discover now one of the most popular franchise of all time on your mobile device !

Discover now one of the most popular franchise of all time on your mobile device !

*Only works with iPad 3 and over, iPad Mini 2 and over, iPhone 5 and over, iPod 6.
Requires an online connection to play.

This game is available in: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Brazilian, Japanese and Korean.

Requires an online connection to play.

*Only works with iPad 3 and over, iPad Mini 2 and over, iPhone 5 and over, iPod 6.
Requires an online connection to play.

Dear Assassins, there is plenty of new content in this huge update!
Available to all:
· Hidden Treasure Chests to find on maps
· New Legendary Items in the Heroic shop including “The Sword of Altair”
· Improved Daily challenges
· Great new novice packs and outfits in the shop including the “Ghost Robe” and “Pulverizer” outfits.
· Weibo & Uplay support to play the game across multiple devices
· Various bug fixes

A brand new campaign “Forlì – A Crimson Sunset” is available for purchase, it includes:
· A brand-new location: the fortified village of Forlì, which has two maps, At Dusk and Under Siege…
· 4 brand-new story missions. Help Ezio and Machiavelli!
· A new type of contract mission: “Crow Hunt”
· 2 legendary weapons to earn from the Heroic shop

Follow us on Facebook www.facebook.com/AssassinsCreedIdentity or Twitter https://twitter.com/ACIdentity to get the latest news !
And thank you for your continuous feedback and support!

Have fun!
Your Assassin’s Creed Identity Team

Attention Assassins!
The Leaderboards are here! It’s time to find out who is the best Assassin in Renaissance Italy.
Content:
- Hall of Fame: List of leading players of each rank. See your ranking and compare it with your friends, and the world
- Earn Event Points and climb the Event Leaderboard to get great rewards
- New items and outfits
- Hero Token packages and lockpicks are now available in the shop
- Several other improvements

Follow us on Facebook www.facebook.com/AssassinsCreedIdentity or Twitter https://twitter.com/ACIdentity to get the latest news !
And thank you for your continuous feedback and support!

Enjoy!
Your Assassin’s Creed Identity Team

Your Assassin’s Creed Identity Team

Ahoy, Assassins!

Get your mitts on the Pirate Update and feast your eyes on new booty. Participate now and get cool new pirate gear including the legendary Kenway set and outfit for maximum swagger!

More updates:
- Added brand new outfits and items including eyepatches with XP boosts!
- Check out which equipment other Assassins are using.
- Reset your profile to restart the game.
- We adjusted the balancing and improved the forge.
- Several other fixes and improvements.

Follow us on Facebook www.facebook.com/AssassinsCreedIdentity or Twitter https://twitter.com/ACIdentity to get the latest news!
And thank you for your continuous feedback and support!

Enjoy!
Your Assassin’s Creed Identity Team

Dear Assassins!
To celebrate the release of the Assassin’s Creed movie we are not only bringing you new gear and chests. Additionally, enjoy our 4 weeks long special event for a chance to win the famous Benedicto and Aguilar outfits!
Collect the new gear from the Spanish Inquisition featuring more than 100 new weapons and armour!
New Relic chests will give you a chance to win colour variations of the Spanish Novice, Benedicto and Aguilar outfits.
Follow us on Facebook www.facebook.com/AssassinsCreedIdentity or Twitter https://twitter.com/ACIdentity to get the latest news!
And thank you for your continuous feedback and support!
Enjoy!
Your Assassin’s Creed Identity Team
